Author: kkemonko
Text: Thanks a lot, I feel crazy. I also have problems with anemia and Iâ€™ve been struggling with weight. I was recovered for a couple years but with the weight gain and this itâ€™s all very triggering :( thank you for the kind words. Hopefully Iâ€™ll be in recovery again soon

Author: mtngdss
Text: If it makes you feel any better, a couple months ago I saw photos of my ex with their new girlfriend, and she was quite larger than me (not hating on her, she's very pretty), and it STILL triggered my ED. ED logic is not real logic. I feel like ED brain finds any reason to flare up.   Also, anyone seeing pictures of their ex with a new SO is bound to pull on the heartstrings. So no, you're NOT crazy for that. Take care of yourself ðŸ’—
